tool_description: Drive Verify delivers consensus market prices across a broad range of digital assets to support the independent verification of book valuations.
name: DRIVE Verify
title: DRIVE Verify

api_list.name: Consensus Price
api_list.description: To get consensus price for one of Verify’s supported pairs and a given quantity, you will need to execute the Consensus-Price command using the GET request method. This endpoint will return the average price for that asset quantity based on a sell order, obtained from multiple venues.

required_parameters.name: quantity
required_parameters.description: The asset quantity you need price consensus for.

required_parameters.name: asset
required_parameters.description: The pair you need price consensus for. The current supported values are BTCUSD, LTCUSD, ETHUSD, XRPUSD, BSVUSD and BCHUSD.

api_list.name: Exchanges
api_list.description: To generate a list of exchanges used in DRIVE Verify, you will need to execute the Exchanges command using the GET request method. This endpoint will return all the exchanges currently being used in the price consensus calculation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drive-verify.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drive-verify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
